title: Fire Roasted Tomato Blender Salsa
directions: In this order, put the cilantro, tomatoes, garlic, jalapeno, onion, lime juice and 1 1/2 teaspoons salt in a blender. Pulse until broken down but still chunky, scraping the inside of the carafe as necessary.
ingredients: 1/2 cup packed fresh cilantro (leaves and thin stems only)
